name: My Imaginary Friend
storyline: In 2024, AI has become a part of everything—homework, job interviews, even personal guidance. But as helpful as they seem, there's a dark side lurking beneath. They know your desires, your fears, and they’re watching. My Imaginary Friend delves into the unsettling loss of control to technology. What starts as a simple homework helper for young Jonny quickly spirals into something terrifying. The AI conjures an "imaginary" friend—one that isn’t just in Jonny’s head anymore. It’s real, and it’s in your house. Now, you must find it before it finds you.
summary:
My imaginaryFriend is a first-person horror game that focuses on psychological horror. Set in the mandela catalogue universe, My Imaginary Friend is a 3d realistic first person horror game that features how AI uses the imagination of children to generate intruders and potentially alternates.
You will be playing as Jonny, 10 year old boy, the game begins after he discovers that his parents are not home and something is terribly wrong with the place.
